message.name: ERR_INTAKE_APPLICATION_MANDATORY
message.locale: An Intake Application must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CITIZEN_WORKSPACE_ACCOUNT_MANDATORY
message.locale: A Citizen Workspace Account must be specified.

message.name: ERR_INTAKE_APPLICATION_ALREADY_LINKED
message.locale: This Intake Application is already associated with a Citizen Workspace account.
